show_name: Yamibo - Darkness, the Hat, and the Travelers of the Books (TV)
other_title: Darkness, the Hat, and the Travelers of the Books
Yami to Bōshi to Hon no Tabibito (Japanese)
ヤミと帽子と本の旅人 (Japanese)
plot: Eve is one of the caretakers of the Great Library, a repository containing all of the worlds in the universe within books. Each episode of "Yamibou" details another one of Eve's lives among the many worlds and follows the adventures of Hatsuki, Lilith, Gargantua and others in search of the girl whom they've known by different names.
opening_theme: "Hitomi no Naka no Meikyū" (瞳の中の迷宮) by Aiko Kayo
ending_theme: "Eien no Inori o Sasagete" (永遠の祈りを捧げて) by Sanae Kobayashi (eps 1-12)
"Hitomi no Naka no Meikyū" (瞳の中の迷宮) by Aiko Kayo (ep 13)
